overview: Welcome to Chuck Lords' backyard. Where Brianna Banks is all naked and you can rest your lemonade right on her ass! Where the poolside honeys try to out-nasty each other for the Vivid cameras while your host Briana makes sure there's a bun for every wiener! You're at Briana's Backyard Barbecue... and you're in the deep end now!
title: Briana's Backyard BBQ
